events.title: Jakarta Tech Summit 2025
events.description: Join Indonesia's largest technology conference featuring keynotes from industry leaders, hands-on workshops, and networking opportunities with over 2,000 tech professionals.
events.shortDescription: Indonesia's premier technology conference with industry leaders and workshops.

events.title: Bali Music Festival
events.description: Experience three days of incredible live music on the beautiful beaches of Bali. Featuring international DJs, local bands, and unforgettable sunset performances.
events.shortDescription: Three days of live music on Bali's stunning beaches.

events.title: Startup Pitch Night
events.description: Watch 10 promising startups pitch their ideas to top investors. Network with founders, VCs, and tech enthusiasts in an inspiring evening of innovation.
events.shortDescription: Watch startups pitch to investors and network with the tech community.

events.title: Yoga & Wellness Retreat
events.description: A transformative weekend of yoga, meditation, and wellness workshops in the serene mountains of Ubud. Includes healthy meals and accommodation.
events.shortDescription: A weekend of yoga and meditation in Ubud's serene mountains.

events.title: Street Food Festival
events.description: Celebrate Indonesia's culinary diversity with over 50 street food vendors, cooking demos, and eating competitions. A foodie's paradise!
events.shortDescription: 50+ street food vendors showcasing Indonesia's culinary diversity.

events.title: Indonesia Art Biennale
events.description: Explore contemporary Indonesian art from over 100 artists. Featuring installations, paintings, sculptures, and interactive digital art experiences.
events.shortDescription: Contemporary art from 100+ Indonesian artists in one venue.

events.title: Marathon Jakarta 2025
events.description: Join thousands of runners in the annual Jakarta Marathon. Choose from 5K, 10K, half marathon, or full marathon distances.
events.shortDescription: Annual Jakarta Marathon with 5K, 10K, half and full distances.

events.title: Web3 Developer Workshop
events.description: Hands-on workshop covering blockchain development, smart contracts, and DeFi. Perfect for developers looking to enter the Web3 space.
events.shortDescription: Hands-on blockchain and smart contract development workshop.

events.title: Future AI Conference 2026
events.description: A deep dive into Generative AI, LLMs, and the future of automation. Featuring speakers from OpenAI, Google, and local tech unicorns.
events.shortDescription: Explore the future of Generative AI and automation.

events.title: Bali Spirit Festival 2026
events.description: A global celebration of yoga, dance, and music. Reconnect with nature and yourself in the heart of Ubud's lush jungle.
events.shortDescription: Global celebration of yoga, dance, and music in Ubud.

events.title: Bandung Indie Fest
events.description: The coolest gathering of independent musicians, artists, and clothing brands in West Java. Support local creativity!
events.shortDescription: Independent music and art festival in Bandung.

events.title: Surabaya Tech Meetup
events.description: Monthly gathering for software engineers, product managers, and designers in East Java. Free pizza and networking.
events.shortDescription: Networking event for Surabaya tech professionals.

events.title: Jogja Puppetry Night
events.description: Experience the magical shadow puppetry (Wayang Kulit) accompanied by a full Gamelan orchestra. A night of heritage and myth.
events.shortDescription: Traditional Wayang Kulit performance with Gamelan.

events.title: National Badminton Open
events.description: Watch Indonesia's top athletes compete in the national qualifiers. High-speed action and intense rallies guaranteed.
events.shortDescription: National level badminton qualifiers.

events.title: Medan Coffee Expo
events.description: Celebrating the world-famous Mandheling and Lintong coffee. Cupping sessions, barista championships, and bean auctions.
events.shortDescription: Expo celebrating Sumatra's famous coffee beans.

events.title: Digital Nomad Summit
events.description: Connect with remote workers from around the globe. Topics include tax residency, remote productivity, and finding work-life balance.
events.shortDescription: Summit for remote workers and digital nomads.

events.title: Semarang Night Run
events.description: A fun 10K run through the historic streets of Kota Lama Semarang at night. Glow sticks and neon gear encouraged!
events.shortDescription: 10K night run through Kota Lama Semarang.

events.title: Introduction to Pottery
events.description: A beginner-friendly workshop on wheel throwing and hand-building ceramics. Create your own mug and bowl.
events.shortDescription: Beginner workshop for wheel throwing ceramics.

events.title: Financial Literacy for Students
events.description: Learn how to budget, save, and invest early. Hosted by leading financial advisors. Open to all university students.
events.shortDescription: Budgeting and investing seminar for students.

events.title: Jakarta Vegan Festival
events.description: Discover plant-based deliciousness! Featuring 30+ vendors, cooking classes, and talks on sustainability.
events.shortDescription: Plant-based food festival with 30+ vendors.

events.title: Kuta Beach Surf Competition
events.description: Amateur and pro divisions. Come watch the surfers tackle the waves or sign up to compete for the grand prize.
events.shortDescription: Amateur and pro surf competition at Kuta.

events.title: Crypto & Blockchain 101
events.description: Understanding the basics of Web3, wallets, and decentralized finance. No technical background required.
events.shortDescription: Beginner's guide to Web3 and Blockchain.

events.title: Jazz on the Hill
events.description: Smooth jazz under the stars in the cool climate of Dago Pakar. Bring a blanket and enjoy the vibes.
events.shortDescription: Outdoor jazz concert in Dago Pakar.

events.title: Mental Health Awareness Run
events.description: Run to break the stigma. 5K fun run with proceeds going to mental health charities.
events.shortDescription: 5K charity run for mental health awareness.

events.title: Traditional Dance Workshop
events.description: Learn the basics of Balinese Legong dance from professional instructors. Sarong and sash provided.
events.shortDescription: Introduction to Balinese Legong dance.

events.title: Startup Legal Clinic
events.description: Free legal consultation for early-stage founders. Cover IP, incorporation, and employment contracts.
events.shortDescription: Free legal advice for startup founders.

events.title: Medan Rock Festival
events.description: Loud music, headbanging, and moshing. Featuring the best rock bands from North Sumatra.
events.shortDescription: Rock music festival in Medan.

events.title: East Java Food Tour
events.description: A guided culinary journey through Surabaya and Malang. Taste Rawon, Rujak Cingur, and Bakso Malang.
events.shortDescription: Guided culinary tour of East Java.

events.title: Product Management Bootcamp
events.description: Intensive 2-day workshop on agile methodologies, user research, and product strategy. Certification included.
events.shortDescription: 2-day intensive product management workshop.

events.title: Yoga for Back Pain
events.description: Specialized therapeutic yoga session designed for office workers and those with chronic back issues.
events.shortDescription: Therapeutic yoga for back pain relief.

events.title: Contemporary Art Auction
events.description: Bid on exclusive pieces from emerging Indonesian artists. A black-tie event for collectors and enthusiasts.
events.shortDescription: Exclusive auction of Indonesian contemporary art.

events.title: Semarang Seafood Festival
events.description: Fresh from the ocean! Enjoy grilled fish, crabs, and prawns at the harbor. Live music and fireworks.
events.shortDescription: Seafood festival at Semarang harbor.

events.title: Global Remote Work Summit 2026
events.description: A fully virtual conference connecting remote workers, digital nomads, and HR leaders. Discussing the future of asynchronous work.
events.shortDescription: Virtual conference on the future of remote work.

events.title: Intro to Python: Live Coding
events.description: Watch and code along in this interactive webinar for beginners. Learn variables, loops, and functions from the comfort of your home.
events.shortDescription: Interactive Python coding webinar for beginners.

events.title: Virtual K-Pop Dance Class
events.description: Learn the choreography to the latest hits. Streamed live in 4K resolution. Mirror mode available.
events.shortDescription: Live streamed K-Pop dance workshop.

events.title: E-Sports Charity Stream
events.description: Pro gamers competing in MOBA and FPS games to raise money for charity. Watch the stream and donate live.
events.shortDescription: Charity livestream featuring pro gamers.

events.title: Guided Meditation: Stress Relief
events.description: A calming audio-visual experience to help you decompress after a long week. Headphones recommended.
events.shortDescription: Online guided meditation for stress relief.

ticket-tiers.name: 3-Day Pass GA
ticket-tiers.description: General admission for all three days

ticket-tiers.name: General Admission
ticket-tiers.description: Free entry to the festival grounds

ticket-tiers.name: Student/Senior Pass
ticket-tiers.description: Discounted entry for students and seniors

ticket-tiers.name: Virtual Pass
ticket-tiers.description: Access to live streams and recordings

reviews.comment: Great content, but the venue was a bit crowded.
